name: 林信標
objective:
1.無線通訊系統簡介
2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹
3.無線電通訊的傳播原理
4.行動通訊之調變技術
5.行動通訊之多工技術
6.天線?多元性與系統分析
7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼
8.無線網路系統
9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
schedule:
1 weeks Overview on Broadband Wireless Access Systems
2 weeks EDGE, HSPA and LTE: Broadband Innovation
3 weeks MIMO-OFDM(A)
2 weeks Overview on WiMAX
3 weeks Overview on LTE 
3 weeks MIMO Applications in 4G Systems
3 weeks Final Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam. (30%)
HomeWork (20%)
    Matlab or Labview simulation
Final Project (50%) 
   Research on selected 4G transmission scheme, such as OFDMA, MIMO, HARQ,
    Femtocell, Handover, Cognitive radio, or Cooperation communication …
    Oral and written reports
    Must focus on your own contributions
materials:
Reference books:

2.     T.S. Rappaport, “Wireless Communications”, 1996, Prentice Hall.
3.　　S.R. Saunders, “Antennas and Propagation for Wireless Communication Systems”, 1999, John Willey & Sons, LTD.
